scripts.build-vdaas-tenant: npm run build-designer && npm run build-report && pnpm -F integration-vdaas-web build && npm run postBuild-vdaas-tenant
scripts.build-vdaas-console: npm run build-designer && npm run build-report && pnpm -F integration-vdaas-console build && npm run postBuild-vdaas-console
scripts.build-vdaas-service: npm run build-report && pnpm -F integration-vdaas-service build && npm run postBuild-vdaas-service
scripts.build-vdaas-service-ghost: npm run build-report && pnpm -F integration-vdaas-service-ghost build && npm run postBuild-vdaas-service-ghost
scripts.build-vdaas: npm run build-designer && npm run build-report && pnpm -F integration-vdaas-web build && npm run postBuild-vdaas-tenant && pnpm -F integration-vdaas-console build && npm run postBuild-vdaas-console
scripts.build-wecost: npm run build-designer && npm run build-report && pnpm -F integration-wecost build && npm run postBuild-wecost
scripts.build: npm run build-vdaas && npm run build-wecost && npm run build-template
scripts.build-vdata: npm run build && npm run postBuild-vdata
